name: Multi-Agent TDD Stack (GUI Demo)
description: Demonstrates multi-agent workflow with explicit generator specification per action pair. Per Remark 5, each generator may be an autonomous Semantic Agent.
specification:
Write pytest-style unit tests for a Stack implementation.

Requirements for tests:
1. Test class named `TestStack`
2. Test push() and pop() operations
3. Test peek() returns top element without removing it
4. Test is_empty() returns correct boolean
5. Test stack underflow (pop on empty stack raises IndexError)
6. Use assert statements

Return only the Python test code, no implementation.
